text: @realDonaldTrump @AMErikaNGIRLLL Sir,  I feel these COVID19 Bio Attacks and "new norms" esp mask wearing are part of a plot to aide in protecting identities of the bad actors of this domestic terror invasion currently taking place in our cities.
